document.full_text: the los angeles angels rallied in the eighth inning and beat the cleveland indians, 6-5, on sunday to give mike scioscia his 1,000th victory as a major league manager.
document.title: roundup: scioscia collects his 1,000th victory as the angels rally
lines_and_colors: the los angeles angels rallied in the eighth inning and beat the cleveland indians, 6-5, on sunday to give mike scioscia his 1,000th victory as a major league manager.
